oneOf.description: Submit one or more signed VAAs to update the on-chain state.  If processing any of the VAAs returns an error, the entire transaction is aborted and none of the VAAs are committed.

vaas.description: One or more VAAs to be submitted.  Each VAA should be encoded in the standard wormhole wire format.

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.
